attributes.action: Public to vote for the Withdrawal Agreement or No Deal
attributes.additional_details: The public votes for Brexit, the PM negotiated the Withdrawal Agreement and on over 100 times stated that "No Deal" is better than a "Bad Deal".  MPs clearly view the deal as bad but cannot agree on what would be 'Good'.  Therefore allow the public to decide what we want.
attributes.background: I believe that Parliament and the Government are not voting in line of what the public want.  I also believe that individual MPs have their own agenda which is frustrating this process and making this a national embarrassment.  A public vote on on the 2 options would help move us forward
